name: Movie-Novels of the Future
description:
“In a near future where all forms of media have been replaced by AR, VR, neural nets, drones, memes, Soylent, and the blockchain, the remnants of previous media have merged into a new media for a new era. They are called "movie-novels." This is a glimpse into that future." 

~uh what the heck is this thing~ 

“Movie-Novels of the Future” is an interactive mashup generator where players can act out scenes which mashup movies and novels in a dystopian future, a desolate media landscape. 

~~

6th Place in Mashup Jam Cult Classics edition
